Sentencas: A four-cell-in-series stack of solid oxide fuel cell is fabricated on a single yttrium-stabilized-zirconia electrolyte plate which is fabricated by tape casting technique.
Titulo: A direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell stack on a single electrolyte plate fabricated by tape casting technique

Sentencas: The slurry for the tape casting process is characterized and optimized through Zeta potential and viscosity measurements.
Titulo: A direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell stack on a single electrolyte plate fabricated by tape casting technique

Sentencas: The optimal slurry is used to prepare the electrolyte plate, with electrical connecting holes, for the stack.
Titulo: A direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell stack on a single electrolyte plate fabricated by tape casting technique

Sentencas: The stack is operated directly with 5 wt% Fe-loaded activated carbon as the fuel.
Titulo: A direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell stack on a single electrolyte plate fabricated by tape casting technique

Sentencas: With a total effective area of 8.8 cm(2) and carbon fuel of 5 g, this direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell stack shows an open circuit voltage of 3.82 V and an output power of 2.2 W at 820 degrees C.
Titulo: A direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell stack on a single electrolyte plate fabricated by tape casting technique

Sentencas: It gives a discharging platform of over 3.0 V for 10.5 h with a constant discharging current of 200 mA, at 800 degrees C. Then voltage drops to zero after discharging for 14 h, releasing a discharging energy of 8.6Wh.
Titulo: A direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell stack on a single electrolyte plate fabricated by tape casting technique

Sentencas: This work shows a possibility of developing direct carbon solid oxide fuel cells for applications of portable or distributed power sources.
Titulo: A direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell stack on a single electrolyte plate fabricated by tape casting technique
A direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell stack on a single electrolyte plate fabricated by tape casting technique
